scripts.seed:demo: bash -lc 'set -a; source .env; set +a; psql "$SUPABASE_PULLING" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f supabase/seed_demo.sql -f supabase/seed_demo_project_tables.sql'
scripts.seed:demo:projects: bash -lc 'set -a; source .env; set +a; psql "$SUPABASE_PULLING" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f supabase/seed_demo_project_tables.sql'
scripts.seed:demo:heavy: bash -lc 'set -a; source .env; set +a; psql "$SUPABASE_PULLING" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f supabase/seed_demo.sql -f supabase/seed_demo_project_tables_heavy.sql'
